name: ishl
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
-| wceq(chl, cin(cbn, ccph))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil ↔(c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))
⊣ CHil =(Ban ⋂ CPreHil)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))
-| wceq(chl, cin(cbn, ccph))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHil ↔(c0 ∈ Ban ∧ c0 ∈ CPreHil))
⊣ CHil =(Ban ⋂ CPreHil)

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wcel(c0, chl), wa(wcel(c0, cbn), wcel(c0, ccph)))

comment: The predicate "is a subcomplex Hilbert space." A Hilbert space is a Banach space which is also an inner product space, i.e. whose norm satisfies the parallelogram law. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 28-Apr-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
